name: Weapons Trainer
originalText: Other creatures you control get +1/+0 as long as you control an Equipment.

rulings.text: Weapons Trainer's ability gives just +1/+0, no matter how many Equipment you control beyond the first.
Weapons Trainer's ability applies even if the Equipment you control isn't attached to any creature.

text: Other creatures you control get +1/+0 as long as you control an Equipment.
